Title: Crazy Calls
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Stephen Basilone, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Erica and Adam deal with their relationship issues, while Beverly deals with Murray's stubbornness.
